name: Evil Hunter
description: Invoke your expertise in anatomy and enemy behavior to detect stealthed and invisible enemies around you for 5 seconds. Exposed enemies cannot return to stealth or invisibility for 4 seconds.   While active, increases the damage of your Stamina costing Fighters Guild abilities by 25%.  While slotted you gain Major Savagery and Prophecy, increasing your Weapon and Spell Critical rating by 2629.
effectLines: While active, your non Ultimate Fighters Guild abilities have increased damage. Increases the radius of the reveal.
rawDescription:
Invoke your expertise in anatomy and enemy behavior to detect stealthed and invisible enemies around you for <<1>>. Exposed enemies cannot return to stealth or invisibility for <<2>>. 

While active, increases the damage of your Stamina costing Fighters Guild abilities by <<3>>.

While slotted you gain <<4>> and Prophecy, increasing your Weapon and Spell Critical rating by <<5>>.
